page.title: 17Hill Top Farm,Shelf
page.content: The farm covers 10 acres of ground and has 7 outbuildings. The farm house was built in 1734,but its presents occupants have only lived there for seven years.They run the (farmand also a(freezer shop)that sells a variety of fresh and frozen produce. The frm (breeds it's own cows and(pigs,) which are killed at the slaughterhouse near Denholme;(the meat(is sold in the shop. The freezer shop was set up as a service for the local people as there are few shops in this area.(It (provides 7 full time and 2 part time( jobs. On the farm there are many(unusual(animals as an added attraction) to shoppers and their children: there are finches,owls, canaries,goats, a Suffolk lamb, a pony and a (llama.
